title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Dems back off blaming Trump for coronavirus because it’s not becoming the crisis they wanted. Drive-Bys blame sexism for Fauxcahontas loss, Trump says she lost because of “lack of talent”. Crazy Bernie can be bought. MSNBC says Bloomberg could have given every American $1 million with what he spent on campaign; math doesn’t add up. GOP could flip 7 House seats in California? The mortality rate for coronavirus is what Rush said it would be, .01-1%, not 2-3%. David Plouffe: Coronavirus is opportunity for Democrats to win. Schumer threatens Supreme Court justices. Libs cancelling meetings over coronavirus. Caller on “the rich” fires up Rush.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

 Trump is handling the coronavirus by remaining calm. This will pass. CDC response. Trump tours tornado damage in Tennessee. Trump has the ability to make things seem okay. Rush gains weight. Great jobs numbers. Economy can withstand coronavirus. Trump at Fox town hall on why he left his great life to be president: to save the country. Rush defends "the rich".

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

 Rush on demonizing "the rich", how success is different than what he imagined. Happiness can't be derived from revenge. Jeff Bezos' mansion. Should we fear the coronavirus? Rush's theory on creation, death and the coronavirus. Clinton says he had affair with Lewinsky to relieve anxiety. Schumer threatens judges. Democrats have killed millions of their own voters through abortion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
